Reviews.Content: chosen hotel due close proximity taksim square istiklal street easy sultan ahmet square using tram metro staff reception desk helpful receptionist arabic breakfast variety food items including freshly prepared cheese rolls 6 child liked clean beds comfortable luxury hotel money paid expected
